ackleyES.cpp

00001 //======================================================================
00060 #include "EALib/sqr.h"
00061 #include "ZNconfig.h"
00062 #include "EALib/Population.h"
00063 
00064 //=======================================================================
00065 //
00066 // fitness function: Ackley's function
00067 //
00068 double ackley( const std::vector< double >& x )
00069 {
00070     const double A = 20.;
00071     const double B = 0.2;
00072     const double C = znPi2C;
00073 
00074     unsigned i, n;
00075     double   a, b;
00076 
00077     for( a = b = 0., i = 0, n = x.size( ); i < n; ++i ) {
00078         a += x[ i ] * x[ i ];
00079         b += cos( C * x[ i ] );
00080     }
00081 
00082     return -A * exp( -B * sqrt( a / n ) ) - exp( b / n ) + A + znEC;
00083 }
00084 
00085 //=======================================================================
00086 //
00087 // main program
00088 //
00089 int main( int argc, char **argv )
00090 {
00091     //
00092     // constants
00093     //
00094     const unsigned Mu           = 15;
00095     const unsigned Lambda       = 100;
00096     const unsigned Dimension    = 30;
00097     const unsigned Iterations   = 500;
00098     const unsigned Interval     = 10;
00099     const unsigned NSigma       = 1;
00100 
00101     const double   MinInit      = -3;
00102     const double   MaxInit      = +15;
00103     const double   SigmaInit    = 3;
00104 
00105     const bool     PlusStrategy = false;
00106 
00107     unsigned       i, t;
00108 
00109     //
00110     // initialize random number generator
00111     //
00112     Rng::seed( argc > 1 ? atoi( argv[ 1 ] ) : 1234 );
00113 
00114     //
00115     // define populations
00116     //
00117     Population parents   ( Mu,     ChromosomeT< double >( Dimension ),
00118                                    ChromosomeT< double >( NSigma    ) );
00119     Population offsprings( Lambda, ChromosomeT< double >( Dimension ),
00120                                    ChromosomeT< double >( NSigma    ) );
00121 
00122     //
00123     // minimization task
00124     //
00125     parents   .setMinimize( );
00126     offsprings.setMinimize( );
00127 
00128     //
00129     // initialize parent population
00130     //
00131     for( i = 0; i < parents.size( ); ++i ) {
00132         dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( parents[ i ][ 0 ] ).initialize( MinInit,   MaxInit   );
00133         dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( parents[ i ][ 1 ] ).initialize( SigmaInit, SigmaInit );
00134     }
00135 
00136     //
00137     // selection parameters (number of elitists)
00138     //
00139     unsigned numElitists = PlusStrategy ? Mu : 0;
00140 
00141     //
00142     // standard deviations for mutation of sigma
00143     //
00144     double     tau0 = 1. / sqrt( 2. * Dimension );
00145     double     tau1 = 1. / sqrt( 2. * sqrt( ( double )Dimension ) );
00146 
00147     //
00148     // evaluate parents (only needed for elitist strategy)
00149     //
00150     if( PlusStrategy )
00151         for( i = 0; i < parents.size( ); ++i )
00152             parents[ i ].setFitness( ackley( dynamic_cast< std::vector< double >& >( parents[ i ][ 0 ] ) ) );
00153 
00154     //
00155     // iterate
00156     //
00157     for( t = 0; t < Iterations; ++t ) {
00158         //
00159         // generate new offsprings
00160         //
00161         for( i = 0; i < offsprings.size( ); ++i ) {
00162             //
00163             // select two random parents
00164             //
00165             Individual& mom = parents.random( );
00166             Individual& dad = parents.random( );
00167 
00168             //
00169             // define temporary references for convenience
00170             //
00171             ChromosomeT< double >& objvar = dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( offsprings[ i ][ 0 ] );
00172             ChromosomeT< double >& sigma  = dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( offsprings[ i ][ 1 ] );
00173 
00174             //
00175             // recombine object variables discrete, step sizes intermediate
00176             //
00177             objvar.recombineDiscrete       ( mom[ 0 ], dad[ 0 ] );
00178             sigma .recombineGenIntermediate( mom[ 1 ], dad[ 1 ] );
00179 
00180             //
00181             // mutate object variables normal distributed,
00182             // step sizes log normal distributed
00183             //
00184             sigma .mutateLogNormal( tau0,  tau1 );
00185             objvar.mutateNormal   ( sigma, true );
00186         }
00187 
00188         //
00189         // evaluate objective function (parameters in chromosome #0)
00190         //
00191         for( i = 0; i < offsprings.size( ); ++i )
00192             offsprings[ i ].setFitness( ackley( dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( offsprings[ i ][ 0 ] ) ) );
00193 
00194         //
00195         // select (mu,lambda) or (mu+lambda)
00196         //
00197         parents.selectMuLambda( offsprings, numElitists );
00198 
00199         //
00200         // print out best value found so far
00201         //
00202         if( t % Interval == 0 )
00203             std::cout << t << "\tbest value = "
00204                  << parents.best( ).fitnessValue( ) << std::endl;
00205     }
00206 
00207     return 0;
00208 }
